DDL.statement: ALTER TABLE APP_MHN ADD WRITE_OFF_REF VARCHAR2(20) DEFAULT ''
ALTER TABLE APP_QM_SAMPLE ADD USER_DATA_3 VARCHAR2(20) DEFAULT ''
ALTER TABLE APP_QM_SAMPLE ADD USER_DATA_4 VARCHAR2(20) DEFAULT ''

INSERT INTO SYS_LANGUAGE (RESOURCE_KEY,LANGUAGE_ID,TEXT,MNEMONIC) VALUES ('lbl_Write_Off_Ref', 'DE', 'Write Off Ref', 'Q')
INSERT INTO SYS_LANGUAGE (RESOURCE_KEY,LANGUAGE_ID,TEXT,MNEMONIC) VALUES ('lbl_Write_Off_Ref', 'ES', 'Write Off Ref', 'Q')
INSERT INTO SYS_LANGUAGE (RESOURCE_KEY,LANGUAGE_ID,TEXT,MNEMONIC) VALUES ('lbl_Write_Off_Ref', 'PL', 'Write Off Ref', 'Q')

CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW view_qm_results AS (SELECT samp.PROCESS_ORDER as PROCESS_ORDER, samp.MATERIAL as MATERIAL, samp.SAMPLE_ID as SAMPLE_ID, samp.SAMPLE_DATE as SAMPLE_DATE, samp.USER_DATA_1 as USER_DATA_1, samp.USER_DATA_2 as USER_DATA_2, samp.USER_DATA_3 as USER_DATA_3, samp.USER_DATA_4 as USER_DATA_4, result.TEST_ID as TEST_ID, dict.DESCRIPTION as TEST_DESCRIPTION, result.VALUE as VALUE, COALESCE(valist.DESCRIPTION,result.VALUE) AS RESULT FROM APP_QM_SAMPLE samp LEFT JOIN APP_QM_RESULT result ON (result.SAMPLE_ID = samp.SAMPLE_ID) LEFT JOIN APP_QM_DICTIONARY dict ON (dict.TEST_ID = result.TEST_ID) LEFT JOIN APP_QM_SELECTLIST valist ON (valist.SELECT_LIST_ID = dict.SELECT_LIST_ID AND valist.VALUE = result.VALUE))
ALTER TABLE SYS_USER_REPORTS MODIFY USER_REPORT_ID VARCHAR2(45)

insert into SYS_USER_REPORTS ( USER_REPORT_ID, DISPLAY_SEQUENCE, DESCRIPTION, SQL_SELECT, MODULE_ID, DESTINATION, ENABLED, PRIVATE, USER_ID, GROUP_ID, PARAM_DATE_RANGE, SAVE_PATH, PREVIEW, PROMPT_SAVE_AS, EMAIL_ENABLED, EMAIL_PROMPT_ENABLED, EMAIL_ADDRESSES) values ( 'USER_DATA_1', '0', 'USER_DATA_1 (SAMPLE LABEL)', 'SELECT APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.DATA FROM APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA RIGHT JOIN APP_PROCESS_ORDER ON APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.MATERIAL = APP_PROCESS_ORDER.MATERIAL AND APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.CUSTOMER_ID = APP_PROCESS_ORDER.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE APP_PROCESS_ORDER.PROCESS_ORDER = ? AND APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.DATA_ID = ''CONTAINER_CODE''', null, 'SYSTEM', 'Y', 'N', '', null, 'N', null, 'N', 'N', 'N', 'N', null)

insert into SYS_USER_REPORTS ( USER_REPORT_ID, DISPLAY_SEQUENCE, DESCRIPTION, SQL_SELECT, MODULE_ID, DESTINATION, ENABLED, PRIVATE, USER_ID, GROUP_ID, PARAM_DATE_RANGE, SAVE_PATH, PREVIEW, PROMPT_SAVE_AS, EMAIL_ENABLED, EMAIL_PROMPT_ENABLED, EMAIL_ADDRESSES) values ( 'USER_DATA_4', '0', 'USER_DATA_4 (SAMPLE LABEL)', 'SELECT APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.DATA FROM APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA RIGHT JOIN APP_PROCESS_ORDER ON APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.MATERIAL = APP_PROCESS_ORDER.MATERIAL AND APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.CUSTOMER_ID = APP_PROCESS_ORDER.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE APP_PROCESS_ORDER.PROCESS_ORDER = ? AND APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA.DATA_ID = ''PRODUCT_GROUP''', null, 'SYSTEM', 'Y', 'N', '', null, 'N', null, 'N', 'N', 'N', 'N', null)

CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW view_qm_analysis_01 (BATCH_SUFFIX, RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION, SAMPLE_DATE, SAMPLE_ID, PROCESS_ORDER, REQUIRED_RESOURCE, MATERIAL, USER_DATA_1, USER_DATA_2, USER_DATA_3, USER_DATA_4, PROD_PANEL, VALUE) AS SELECT APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE.BATCH_SUFFIX, APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION AS RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION, APP_QM_SAMPLE.SAMPLE_DATE, APP_QM_SAMPLE.SAMPLE_ID, APP_QM_SAMPLE.PROCESS_ORDER, APP_PROCESS_ORDER.REQUIRED_RESOURCE, APP_QM_SAMPLE.MATERIAL, APP_QM_SAMPLE.USER_DATA_1 AS USER_DATA_1, APP_QM_SAMPLE.USER_DATA_2 AS USER_DATA_2, APP_QM_SAMPLE.USER_DATA_3 AS USER_DATA_3, APP_QM_SAMPLE.USER_DATA_4 AS USER_DATA_4, APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PROD.DESCRIPTION AS PROD_PANEL, APP_QM_RESULT_PH.VALUE FROM APP_QM_SAMPLE JOIN APP_QM_RESULT APP_QM_RESULT_PH ON (APP_QM_SAMPLE.SAMPLE_ID = APP_QM_RESULT_PH.SAMPLE_ID) JOIN APP_QM_RESULT APP_QM_RESULT_PROD ON (APP_QM_SAMPLE.SAMPLE_ID = APP_QM_RESULT_PROD.SAMPLE_ID) JOIN APP_QM_RESULT APP_QM_RESULT_PACK ON (APP_QM_SAMPLE.SAMPLE_ID = APP_QM_RESULT_PACK.SAMPLE_ID) JOIN APP_QM_DICTIONARY APP_QM_DICTIONARY_PROD ON (APP_QM_RESULT_PROD.TEST_ID = APP_QM_DICTIONARY_PROD.TEST_ID) JOIN APP_QM_SELECTLIST APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PROD ON (APP_QM_DICTIONARY_PROD.SELECT_LIST_ID = APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PROD.SELECT_LIST_ID) AND (APP_QM_RESULT_PROD.VALUE = APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PROD.VALUE) JOIN APP_QM_DICTIONARY APP_QM_DICTIONARY_PACK ON (APP_QM_RESULT_PACK.TEST_ID = APP_QM_DICTIONARY_PACK.TEST_ID) JOIN APP_QM_SELECTLIST APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PACK ON (APP_QM_DICTIONARY_PACK.SELECT_LIST_ID = APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PACK.SELECT_LIST_ID) AND (APP_QM_RESULT_PACK.VALUE = APP_QM_SELECTLIST_PACK.VALUE) JOIN APP_PROCESS_ORDER ON (APP_QM_SAMPLE.PROCESS_ORDER = APP_PROCESS_ORDER.PROCESS_ORDER) JOIN APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE ON (APP_PROCESS_ORDER.REQUIRED_RESOURCE = APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE.REQUIRED_RESOURCE) WHERE APP_QM_RESULT_PROD.TEST_ID = 'PANEL' AND APP_QM_RESULT_PACK.TEST_ID = 'PACKAGING VERIFICATION' AND APP_QM_RESULT_PH.TEST_ID = 'PANEL PH' ORDER BY APP_PROCESS_ORDER_RESOURCE.BATCH_SUFFIX, APP_QM_RESULT_PROD.SAMPLE_ID

insert into SYS_MODULES ( MODULE_ID, RF_ACTIVE, DK_ACTIVE, MODULE_TYPE, HINT, MNEMONIC, ICON_FILENAME, HELPSET_ID, REPORT_FILENAME, EXEC_FILENAME, EXEC_DIR, PRINT_PREVIEW, PRINT_DIALOG, PRINT_COPIES, REPORT_TYPE, RESOURCE_KEY, AUTO_LABELLER_COMMAND_FILE, AUTO_LABELLER_LABEL_FILE) values ( 'RPT_QM_ANALYSIS_01', 'N', 'Y', 'REPORT', null, '0', null, null, 'QM_Analysis_01.jrxml', null, null, 'Y', 'Y', '1', 'Standard', 'mod_RPT_QM_ANALYSIS_01', null, null)

CREATE TABLE APP_QM_ANALYSIS ( ANALYSIS_ID VARCHAR2(25 BYTE) NOT NULL ENABLE, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR2(80 BYTE), DISPLAY_SEQUENCE NUMBER DEFAULT 1, MODULE_ID VARCHAR2(35 BYTE) DEFAULT 'RPL_', PROCESS_ORDER_REQD VARCHAR2(1 BYTE) DEFAULT 'N', PROCESS_ORDER_PARAM VARCHAR2(45 BYTE) DEFAULT 45, MATERIAL_REQD VARCHAR2(1 BYTE) DEFAULT 'N', MATERIAL_PARAM VARCHAR2(45 BYTE) DEFAULT 'P_MATERIAL', SAMPLE_DATE_START_REQD VARCHAR2(1 BYTE) DEFAULT 'N', SAMPLE_DATE_START_PARAM VARCHAR2(45 BYTE) DEFAULT 'P_SAMPLE_DATE_START', SAMPLE_DATE_END_REQD VARCHAR2(1 BYTE) DEFAULT 'N', SAMPLE_DATE_END_PARAM VARCHAR2(45 BYTE) DEFAULT 'P_SAMPLE_DATE_END', USER_DATA_1_REQD VARCHAR2(1 BYTE) DEFAULT 'N', USER_DATA_1_PARAM VARCHAR2(45 BYTE) DEFAULT 'P_USER_DATA_1', USER_DATA_2_REQD VARCHAR2(1 BYTE) DEFAULT 'N', USER_DATA_2_PARAM VARCHAR2(45 BYTE) DEFAULT 'P_USER_DATA_2', USER_DATA_3_REQD VARCHAR2(1 BYTE) DEFAULT 'N', USER_DATA_3_PARAM VARCHAR2(45 BYTE) DEFAULT 'P_USER_DATA_4', USER_DATA_4_REQD VARCHAR2(1 BYTE) DEFAULT 'N', USER_DATA_4_PARAM VARCHAR2(45 BYTE) DEFAULT 'P_USER_DATA_4', BATCH_SUFFIX_REQD VARCHAR2(1 BYTE) DEFAULT 'N', BATCH_SUFFIX_PARAM VARCHAR2(45 BYTE) DEFAULT 'P_BATCH_SUFFIX', RESOURCE_REQD VARCHAR2(1 BYTE) DEFAULT 'N', RESOURCE_PARAM VARCHAR2(45 BYTE) DEFAULT 'P_RESOURCE', CONSTRAINT APP_QM_ANALYSIS_PK PRIMARY KEY (ANALYSIS_ID))

INSERT INTO APP_QM_ANALYSIS VALUES ('AN_01','Analysis of Panel Results',1,'RPT_QM_ANALYSIS_01','N','P_PROCESS_ORDER','N','P_MATERIAL','Y','P_SAMPLE_DATE_START','Y','P_SAMPLE_DATE_END','N','P_USER_DATA_1','N','P_USER_DATA_2','N','P_USER_DATA_3','N','P_USER_DATA_4','Y','P_BATCH_SUFFIX','N','P_RESOURCE')

ALTER TABLE APP_QM_SELECTLIST ADD VISIBLE VARCHAR2(1 BYTE) DEFAULT 'Y'

insert into SYS_USER_REPORTS ( USER_REPORT_ID, DISPLAY_SEQUENCE, DESCRIPTION, SQL_SELECT, MODULE_ID, DESTINATION, ENABLED, PRIVATE, USER_ID, GROUP_ID, PARAM_DATE_RANGE, SAVE_PATH, PREVIEW, PROMPT_SAVE_AS, EMAIL_ENABLED, EMAIL_PROMPT_ENABLED, EMAIL_ADDRESSES) values ( 'DESPATCH_EXP', '0', 'Export Despatch Data', 'SELECT P.DESPATCH_NO, P.SSCC, D.DESPATCH_DATE, D.LOCATION_ID_FROM, D.TRAILER, D.HAULIER, D.LOAD_NO, D.JOURNEY_REF FROM APP_PALLET_HISTORY P, APP_DESPATCH D WHERE D.DESPATCH_DATE >= ? AND D.DESPATCH_DATE <= ? AND P.TRANSACTION_REF = D.TRANSACTION_REF AND P.TRANSACTION_TYPE = ''DESPATCH'' AND P.TRANSACTION_SUBTYPE = ''TO'' AND D.LOCATION_ID_TO = ''HAMS HALL'' ORDER BY D.DESPATCH_NO DESC,P.SSCC ASC', '', 'EXCEL', 'Y', 'N', '', '', 'N', '', 'N', 'N', 'N', 'N', '')
